clean_pump_lid.description: Clean the pump lid to ensure it functions properly.

press_pump_lid.description: Press the pump lid to flush the toilet.

close_lid.description: Close the toilet lid by swinging it on its hinge to the closed position.

clean_opened_lid.description: Clean the opened toilet lid to ensure hygiene is maintained.

open_lid.description: Open the toilet lid by swinging it on its hinge to the opened position.

clean_closed_lid.description: Clean the closed toilet lid to ensure hygiene is maintained.

close_seat.description: Close the toilet seat by swinging it on its hinge to the closed position.

clean_opened_seat.description: Clean the opened toilet seat for proper hygiene.

open_seat.description: Open the toilet seat by swinging it on its hinge to the opened position.

clean_closed_seat.description: Clean the closed toilet seat for proper hygiene.

clean_toilet_body.description: Clean the physical toilet body to ensure hygiene is maintained

press_button.description: Press the button to flush the toilet.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure it functions properly.

clean_whole_toilet.description: Clean entire toilet including the seats, lids, button, and toilet body.

open_toilet.description: Open up the toilet for use by lifting both the lid and the seat.

close_toilet.description: Close the entire toilet after use by putting down both the lid and the seat.
